name: ClaudeCodeBaseTask
description: Run Claude Code in Azure DevOps pipelines
helpMarkDown: Run Claude Code AI assistant in Azure DevOps pipelines for automated code analysis, issue triage, and development tasks.
author: Anthropic

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: The prompt to send to Claude Code (mutually exclusive with prompt_file)

inputs.name: prompt_file
inputs.label: Prompt File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a file containing the prompt to send to Claude Code (mutually exclusive with prompt)

inputs.name: allowed_tools
inputs.label: Allowed Tools
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of allowed tools for Claude Code to use

inputs.name: disallowed_tools
inputs.label: Disallowed Tools
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of disallowed tools that Claude Code cannot use

inputs.name: max_turns
inputs.label: Max Turns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of conversation turns (default: no limit)

inputs.name: mcp_config
inputs.label: MCP Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: MCP configuration as JSON string or path to MCP configuration JSON file

inputs.name: system_prompt
inputs.label: System Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override system prompt

inputs.name: append_system_prompt
inputs.label: Append System Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Append to system prompt

inputs.name: reviewer_terraform
inputs.label: Terraform Review (.tf, .tfvars)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Inject Terraform review standards (naming, dependencies, logic, security). Reads modified .tf and .tfvars files. User prompt takes priority over these defaults.

inputs.name: reviewer_yaml
inputs.label: YAML / Kubernetes Review (.yaml, .yml)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Inject YAML/Kubernetes review standards (structure, secrets hygiene, resource limits). User prompt takes priority over these defaults.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Model to use (provider-specific format required for Bedrock/Vertex)

inputs.name: fallback_model
inputs.label: Fallback Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable automatic fallback to specified model when default model is unavailable

inputs.name: claude_env
inputs.label: Claude Environment Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom environment variables to pass to Claude Code execution (YAML multiline format)

inputs.name: timeout_minutes
inputs.label: Timeout Minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout in minutes for Claude Code execution

inputs.name: anthropic_api_key
inputs.label: Anthropic API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Anthropic API key (required for direct Anthropic API)

inputs.name: claude_code_oauth_token
inputs.label: Claude Code OAuth Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Claude Code OAuth token (alternative to anthropic_api_key)

inputs.name: use_bedrock
inputs.label: Use AWS Bedrock
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Amazon Bedrock with service connection authentication instead of direct Anthropic API

inputs.name: use_vertex
inputs.label: Use Google Vertex AI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Google Vertex AI with service connection authentication instead of direct Anthropic API

inputs.name: aws_region
inputs.label: AWS Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: AWS region for Bedrock (required when use_bedrock is true)

inputs.name: gcp_project_id
inputs.label: GCP Project ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Cloud project ID for Vertex AI (required when use_vertex is true)

inputs.name: gcp_region
inputs.label: GCP Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Cloud region for Vertex AI (required when use_vertex is true)

inputs.name: use_node_cache
inputs.label: Use Node.js Cache
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to use Node.js dependency caching (set to true only for Node.js projects with lock files)

inputs.name: install_claude_cli
inputs.label: Install Claude CLI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Install Claude Code CLI if not already present. Set to false when the agent image already has the CLI installed.

inputs.name: post_pr_comments
inputs.label: Post Review as PR Comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Post issues as inline PR thread comments after execution. Only fires if issues are found. Requires System.AccessToken to be available.

outputVariables.name: conclusion
outputVariables.description: Execution status of Claude Code ('success' or 'failure')

outputVariables.name: execution_file
outputVariables.description: Path to the JSON file containing Claude Code execution log
